titles.title: STAND with Taiwan Act of 2024
Sanctions Targeting Aggressors of Neighboring Democracies with Taiwan Act of 2024
STAND with Taiwan Act of 2024
A bill to require the imposition of sanctions with respect to the People's Republic of China if the People's Liberation Army initiates a military invasion of Taiwan.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
